snippet: The drug maker Allergan said the Food and Drug Administration had declined to approve Levadex because of concerns about the manufacturing of the inhaler used with it.
lead_paragraph: The drug maker Allergan said the Food and Drug Administration had declined to approve Levadex because of concerns about the manufacturing of the inhaler used with it.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Rejects Levadex, a New Drug for Migraines
headline.main: F.D.A. Rejects New Drug for Migraines
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Rejects New Drug for Migraines
